verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. I will lift <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> unto the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>: From <S%H370>whence<s%> shall my <S%H5828>help<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>?
He will not <S%H5414>suffer<s%> thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> to be <S%H4132>moved<s%>: He that <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> thee will not <S%H5123>slumber<s%>.
Behold <S%H8104><s%>, he that keepeth <S%H3478>Israel<s%> Will neither <S%H5123>slumber<s%> nor <S%H3462>sleep<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is thy <S%H8104>keeper<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is thy <S%H6738>shade<s%> upon thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall not <S%H5221>smite<s%> thee by <S%H3119>day<s%>, Nor the <S%H3394>moon<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H8104>keep<s%> thee from all <S%H7451>evil<s%>; He will <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy going <S%H3318>out<s%> and thy coming <S%H935>in<s%> From this time forth and <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
